meanings.definition: Cook (food) in hot fat or oil, typically in a shallow pan.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys frying eggs for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom is frying chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried frying a fish in the sun, thinking it was a stove.
meanings.sent4: His anger was like frying oil, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sizzling frying pan filled the kitchen with a tempting aroma.

meanings.definition: The action of cooking food in hot fat or oil.
meanings.sent1: Frying is a common cooking method used in many cuisines.
meanings.sent2: The smell of frying always makes me hungry.
meanings.sent3: The frying contest at the fair was a hilarious event.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like the oil in a frying pan.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the frying echoed through the house, signaling dinner was almost ready.
